page.title: 11GAMES children play-school
page.content: {Stuck in the mud}One person is "it" and they chase after the other people. If you get caught you stand with your arms outstretched. Somebody who is free has to run under your arms and you are free.If you get stuck three times you are "it".{ {Donkey}To play this game you will need 1 ball.Throw the ball onto the wall.When it has bounced once do a star jump over it.If you don't jump over it you get D,the next time you miss you get an O etc.When you spell out DONKEY you out of the game. {Sky,Rain,Thunder,Lightning }One person is "it" and stands in front of the other people and says "Sky,rain, thunder,lightning" and when the person has finished speaking they all do handstands.The person who stays up there the longest is "it".Then they have to go up to the front instead.
